marklogic.body: i wonder if i shaved my head, put on black, and strapped on my leather jack boots how far i would make it through the hood in LA or Detroit. Would everyone dress up like me and have massive protests ? would my congressman dress up like me and demand justice on the hill. my guess zimmerman was a gun toting hot head Itching to take somebody/anybody down. my guess is trayvon was Acting like a punk at the wrong place at the wrong time around the wrong guy.
